DataCommand.Name: Permission_Save
DataCommand.Text: declare @rowcount int UPDATE Permission SET Category = @PermissionCategory, Description = @PermissionDescription, ModifiedOn=GetUTCDate(), ModifiedBy='SYSTEM' WHERE PermissionName=@PermissionName set @rowcount = @@rowcount if(@rowcount=0) begin INSERT Permission (PermissionName, Category, Description, CreatedOn, CreatedBy, ModifiedOn, ModifiedBy ) VALUES (@PermissionName, @PermissionCategory, @PermissionDescription, GetUTCDate(), 'SYSTEM', GetUTCDate(), 'SYSTEM') end
